title: Healthy lungs
creator_credit: David A. Smart and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Shows the part of the breathing mechanism in contact with the air and demonstrates how the exchange of waste products for oxygen takes place. Explains how disease affects the lungs and recommends procedures to keep the lungs in a healthy condition.
creator_credit_for_label: David A. Smart and Coronet Instructional Films
